title: Car Engines Sound Pack Vol. 2
description: The second version of the Car Engine sound package contains 400 sound effects, including city, sports, off-road and pickup vehicle sounds.
longDescription:
Audio Preview: https://soundcloud.com/magic-sound-effects/mse-car-engines-vol-2-sound-library-preview

Full Audio Preview: https://youtu.be/CAo7iCRNR1Y

Sound List: https://www.dropbox.com/s/8zusgb6pngoxqg4/MSE%20-%20Car%20Engines%20Vol.%202.pdf?dl=0


The collection includes sounds for each vehicle:

  • 32 fast and 32 slow acceleration sounds
  • 32 fast and 32 slow deceleration sounds
  • 80 seamless loops of engine rpm sounds at five speeds - idle, low rpm, mid rpm, high and very high rpm
  • 128 transition sounds between speeds
  • 32 start and stop engine sounds
  • 16 start engine and 16 stop engine sounds
  • 32 sounds of passing cars


Total in the package of 16 cars: 4 city cars, 6 sports cars, 4 off-road cars, 2 pickup trucks. All sounds have been created in a realistic style, using realistic vehicle samples.


With so many variations of car engine sounds, this package is perfect for creating engine roar sounds for realistic cars, including racing cars. It can also be used to create futuristic light vehicles. Enjoy!


For support and other questions, please send an email to: magic.sound.effects@gmail.com.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • 400 game-ready sound effects.
  • 44.1 khz, 16 bit, wav, stereo.
  • 16 cars in total.Â 
  • 4 city cars, 6 sport cars, 4 off-road, 2 pickup cars.
  • 5 types of engine rpm - idle, low, mid, high, very high.
  • 80 seamless loops of engine rpm sounds in total.
  • 64 acceleration sounds, 64 deceleration sounds.
  • 128 transition sounds between engine rpm.
  • 32 start and stop engine sounds.
  • 32 sounds of passing cars.
  • perfect for the game genres of simulation, adventure, strategy and others.


Number of Audio Waves: 400

Number of Audio Cues: 400

Sample rate / bit rate: 44.100 Hz / 16 Bit

Do Sound FX loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 49 minutes 29 seconds

Supported Development Platforms: All

  • Windows: Yes
  • Mac: Yes
